aka: 维也纳歌剧院歌剧普契尼《波希米亚人》

director.name: 佛朗哥·泽菲雷里 Franco Zeffirelli

trans_title: 维也纳歌剧院歌剧普契尼《波希米亚人》
introduction: We see four young men struggling through their meager lives as artists. All at once, love blazes into Rodolfo's life, as he meets the needlewoman, Mimì. From their first encounter on, it is sadly evident, however, that Mimì is fatally ill. Rodolfo decides to withdraw, to allow her to escape poverty. Some months later, they reunite, and Mimì dies in Rodolfo's loving arms.CAST | 22.12.2019CONDUCTOR	Marco ArmiliatoDIRECTOR	Franco ZeffirelliCOSTUME DESIGN	Marcel EscoffierRodolfo	Stefan PopMimì	Irina LunguMarcello	Marco CariaMusetta	Mariam Battistelli
